snippet: The seller was RedZone Capital Management, a private equity firm run by the owner of the Washington Redskins, Daniel M. Snyder. The price is said to be about $370 million.
abstract: The seller was RedZone Capital Management, a private equity firm run by the owner of the Washington Redskins, Daniel M. Snyder. The price is said to be about $370 million.

headline.main: Dick Clark Productions Sold to Guggenheim Partners
